data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marshall, Stephen A. (2019): A revision of the genus Mesoconius Enderlein (Diptera, Micropezidae, Taeniapterinae). European Journal of Taxonomy 548: 1-126, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.548|173 occurrences
